ArgonTest.Name: Class override class method
ArgonTest.InputSource:
import Ar._
open class A <: Object
public new() end
public virtual proc self.say_hello(): Unit do puts 'Hello' end
end
class B <: A
public new() initialize _ = A.new() end
public override proc self.say_hello(): Unit do puts 'Moo' end end
proc main(): Unit do val obj: A = B.new() obj.say_hello() end
